name: Yuan Gui
shortLoreBlurb: Yuan Gui is a spirit from China linked to wronged ghosts, justice. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
overlapsLinks: Anubis (Egyptian), Athena (Greek), Hel (Norse), Karttikeya (Hindu), Sekhmet (Egyptian), Yama (Buddhist)
description: Yuan Gui is a spirit from China linked to wronged ghosts, justice. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
